data.title: Umicore SA Share Price - EBR:UMI Stock Research
data.meta_description: Discover all the factors affecting Umicore SA's share price. UMI is currently rated as a Contrarian | Stockopedia
data.text:
The analyst consensus target price for shares in Umicore SA is €17.80. That is 25.44% above the last closing price of €14.19.

Analysts covering Umicore SA currently have a consensus Earnings Per Share (EPS) forecast of €1.20 for the next financial year.

An important predictor of whether a stock price will go up is its track record of momentum. Price trends tend to persist, so it's worth looking at them when it comes to a share like Umicore SA . Over the past six months, its share price has underperformed the FTSE Global All Cap Index by -46.99%.

As of the last closing price of €14.19, shares in Umicore SA were trading -33.48% below their 200 day moving average. You can read more about the power of momentum in assessing share price movements on Stockopedia.

The Umicore SA PE ratio based on its reported earnings over the past 12 months is 11.3. The shares last closed at €14.19.

The PE ratio (or price-to-earnings ratio) is the one of the most popular valuation measures used by stock market investors. It is calculated by dividing a company's price per share by its earnings per share.

The PE ratio can be seen as being expressed in years, in the sense that it shows the number of years of earnings which would be required to pay back the purchase price, ignoring inflation. So in general terms, the higher the PE, the more expensive the stock is.
